About Me

A few things you might want to know!

BIO

Recently ended the second semester of my 2 Year Computer Programmer Diploma at the accredited, Algonquin College. Being from Alberta I spent my first few years out of highschool in the Oil and Gas industry and I thought to myself how can I impact this field to make things easier and now here I am, I've always had an interest in development and technology as well as high ambition to achieve anything I pursue with that being said I am here to achieve a 2022 internship where I can learn and grow and make an Impact wherever I am needed.
